description:
Configuration to generate catalysts with a desired binding energy.

    Example:
    Assuming model service cataloged name of gt4sd_gen

    <cmd> gt4sd_gen generate with CatalystGenerator data for 1 sample 20 </cmd>



    Example:
    Assuming gt4sd_gen is the given model service name:

    <cmd>gt4sd_gen generate with CatalystGenerator data for 1 sample 20</cmd>

target.title: Target energy
target.description: Binding energy target for the catalysts generated.

number_of_points.title: Number Of Points
number_of_points.description: Number of points to sample with the Gaussian Process.

number_of_steps.title: Number Of Steps
number_of_steps.description: Number of optimization steps in the Gaussian Process optimization.

generated_length.title: Generated Length
generated_length.description: Maximum length in tokens of the generated molcules (relates to the SMILES length).

primer_smiles.title: Primer Smiles
primer_smiles.description: Primer molecule to initiate the sampling in SMILES format. Defaults to no primer.
